column6: The hordes of Hydra make a final push to take over the United States!!  And it's up to everyone's favorite red, white, and blue web-slinger to make sure that "HAIL HYDRA" isn't the new national anthem!
column8: | penciller (cover):Kaare Andrews | penciller:Mike Deodato | writer:Stan Lee | colorist:Matt Milla | letterer:Cory Petit | inker:Jose Pimentel
